definition[0]: a group of people who agree to travel together to work, school etc in one car and share the cost
definition[1]: a group of cars that a company or organization owns for its workers or members to use
definition[2]: a group of cars owned by a company or other organization that its members can use
definition[3]: a group of car owners who agree to go to work together in one car
example[0]: highways with ‘car pool lanes’ for vehicles carrying more than two passengers
